mapper.select: select * from lesson_problem t1 left JOIN (select * from lesson_attend_log where stu_id=#{studentId}) t2 ON t1.lesson_id=t2.lesson_id where t1.wechat_status=0 order by begin_time asc
select * from problem_choice a left JOIN(select* from problem_choice_options) b on a.id=b.problem_id where a.id =#{problemId}
